entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 5:53 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
